title: I'm Going on a Tulum Getaway—Here's Everything I'm Packing From Fashion to Beauty
description: Everything you need to jet set!
excerpt: Chichi is headed to Tulum, Mexico, and is cluing us in on what exactly she plans on packing for the beach getaway.
text: In a few weeks, I'm headed to Tulum, Mexico to celebrate a dear friend's 30th birthday. It'll be my first time in Mexico, so I'm more than excited to explore the cenotes, eat great food, and check out some historical sites. To prepare for my adventures in Latin America, I'm planning out everything I'll need from fashion to beauty. Since I believe in sharing love, I'm including the best finds from my packing list ahead.As a fashion editor, I take hunting down the best finds super seriously. From inclusive-size matching sets and cool swimsuits to the in-flight moisturizer I swear by, you can find everything I'm packing for my trip to Mexico below. Keep scrolling for inspiration for what to bring on your next adventure. Nomads Swimwear Isle One Piece I'm a sucker for a great black one-piece. Tyler McGillivary Charlie Tank Tyler McGillivary Charlie Skirt This has a tropical vibe to it. Khanums Off the Shoulder Top I can't wait to wear this beauty. Shop the matching bottoms here. What Lo Wants Kendall Mesh Asymmetrical Top I'm a sucker for an asymmetrical top. What Lo Wants Lindsey Mesh O-Ring Pant Pair with the top for a banging beach-club look. Fashion people everywhere are embracing Havianas once again. What Lo Wants Michaela Lace Mini Dress GIA/irl Penelope Skirt in Ivory This white miniskirt will go with so many things. GIA/irl Delilah Leopard Mini Dress I'm loving little doses of leopard print. GA-SALE Sandwashed Jersey Maxi Dress Conditions Apply Chloe Maxi Slip Dress The horses are a fun touch. Reformation Serenity Bare Kitten Sandal Add a pop of color to your fave vacation looks. Lovers and Friends Cordelia Top Lovers and Friends Cordelia Mini Skirt JENNY BIRD US Colette Hoop Earrings Medium These earrings have been everywhere, and I cannot get enough. JENNY BIRD US Colette Cuff Heaven Mayhem Ribbed Gold These kind of resemble Mayan ruins. They'll be perfect for our adventure to Chichén Itzá. ELOQUII Off the Shoulder Maxi Dress This elegant dress will be perfect for a nice dinner out on the town. Beauty Kopari Protector Solar Golden Amber Sun Shield Sunscreen Spf This body oil adds the perfect shimmery glow while protecting you from the sun. Maison Margiela Replica Jazz Club Travel Spray My go-to scent is Jazz Club, and it's truly perfect for all occasions. I love keeping a travel-size spray for all my trips. Summer Fridays Jet Lag Mask I don't know about you, but I take in flight moisturizing very seriously. NYX Professional Makeup Fat Oil Lip Drip Vegan Lip Oil This is hands down my favorite lip oil product, and I've tried so many. Milani Color Statement Lip Liner You can't go wrong lining your lips. Urban Decay All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray I'll be sweating buckets, but this setting spray will keep my face on no matter what. about-face Fractal Glitter Eye Paint I'm simple when it comes to eye makeup. Give me an easy to apply golden eye shadow, and I'm more than pleased. Youth To The People The Youth System As far as travel skincare goes, I'm never disappointed with Youth to the People. Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor and model who has recently relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast offices. For WWW, she utilizes her love of personal style to dish out shopping advice to the masses.After graduating from the University of Georgia's Grady College of Journalism, Chichi moved to Brooklyn and began hustling to make it in the NYC media world. Before landing at WWW, she spent some time at Vice Media Group, where she helped revolutionize Refinery29's plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage and even co-hosted a summer styling series. Prior to R29, she supported Bustle Digital Group's commerce team and freelanced for various publications.Chichi is a multi-passionate, pop culture–obsessed television and music lover who enjoys a good concert and a yummy meal just as much as she loves analyzing cultural trends and throwing together a solid outfit. After work, you can probably find her bopping around the best L.A. restaurants talking about her latest ADHD-fueled hyper-fixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, TikTok black hole discoveries, and theories on the emo-rock music revival).
html:
In a few weeks, I'm headed to Tulum, Mexico to celebrate a dear friend's 30th birthday. It'll be my first time in Mexico, so I'm more than excited to explore the cenotes, eat great food, and check out some historical sites. To prepare for my adventures in Latin America, I'm planning out everything I'll need from fashion to beauty. Since I believe in sharing love, I'm including the best finds from my packing list ahead.

As a fashion editor, I take hunting down the best finds super seriously. From inclusive-size matching sets and cool swimsuits to the in-flight moisturizer I swear by, you can find everything I'm packing for my trip to Mexico below. Keep scrolling for inspiration for what to bring on your next adventure.

Nomads Swimwear

Isle One Piece

I'm a sucker for a great black one-piece.

Tyler McGillivary

Charlie Tank

Tyler McGillivary

Charlie Skirt

This has a tropical vibe to it.

Khanums

Off the Shoulder Top

I can't wait to wear this beauty.

Shop the matching bottoms here.

What Lo Wants

Kendall Mesh Asymmetrical Top

I'm a sucker for an asymmetrical top.

What Lo Wants

Lindsey Mesh O-Ring Pant

Pair with the top for a banging beach-club look.

Fashion people everywhere are embracing Havianas once again.

What Lo Wants

Michaela Lace Mini Dress

Penelope Skirt in Ivory

This white miniskirt will go with so many things.

GIA/irl

Delilah Leopard Mini Dress

I'm loving little doses of leopard print.

GA-SALE

Sandwashed Jersey Maxi Dress

The horses are a fun touch.

Reformation

Serenity Bare Kitten Sandal

Add a pop of color to your fave vacation looks.

Lovers and Friends

Cordelia Top

Lovers and Friends

JENNY BIRD US

Colette Hoop Earrings Medium

These earrings have been everywhere, and I cannot get enough.

JENNY BIRD US

Colette Cuff

Heaven Mayhem

Ribbed Gold

These kind of resemble Mayan ruins. They'll be perfect for our adventure to Chichén Itzá.

ELOQUII

Off the Shoulder Maxi Dress

This elegant dress will be perfect for a nice dinner out on the town.

Beauty

Kopari

Protector Solar Golden Amber Sun Shield Sunscreen Spf

This body oil adds the perfect shimmery glow while protecting you from the sun.

Maison Margiela

Replica Jazz Club Travel Spray

My go-to scent is Jazz Club, and it's truly perfect for all occasions. I love keeping a travel-size spray for all my trips.

Summer Fridays

Jet Lag Mask

I don't know about you, but I take in flight moisturizing very seriously.

NYX Professional Makeup

Fat Oil Lip Drip Vegan Lip Oil

This is hands down my favorite lip oil product, and I've tried so many.

Milani

Color Statement Lip Liner

You can't go wrong lining your lips.

Urban Decay

All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray

I'll be sweating buckets, but this setting spray will keep my face on no matter what.

about-face

Fractal Glitter Eye Paint

I'm simple when it comes to eye makeup. Give me an easy to apply golden eye shadow, and I'm more than pleased.

Youth To The People

The Youth System

As far as travel skincare goes, I'm never disappointed with Youth to the People.

Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor and model who has recently relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast offices. For WWW, she utilizes her love of personal style to dish out shopping advice to the masses.After graduating from the University of Georgia's Grady College of Journalism, Chichi moved to Brooklyn and began hustling to make it in the NYC media world. Before landing at WWW, she spent some time at Vice Media Group, where she helped revolutionize Refinery29's plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage and even co-hosted a summer styling series. Prior to R29, she supported Bustle Digital Group's commerce team and freelanced for various publications.Chichi is a multi-passionate, pop culture–obsessed television and music lover who enjoys a good concert and a yummy meal just as much as she loves analyzing cultural trends and throwing together a solid outfit. After work, you can probably find her bopping around the best L.A. restaurants talking about her latest ADHD-fueled hyper-fixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, TikTok black hole discoveries, and theories on the emo-rock music revival).
